# Model Context Protocol (MCP) {.center .smaller}

**Standardized AI Integration**

Connecting AI models with tools and data sources seamlessly

---

## What is MCP? {.smaller}

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="40%"}

![modelcontextprotocol.io](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/fe/Model_Context_Protocol_logo.svg){width=200 style="margin: 20px auto 0 auto; display: block; text-align: center;"}

:::
::: {.column width="60%"}

**Model Context Protocol (MCP)**

Open standard untuk menghubungkan AI models dengan:

- External tools & APIs

- Data sources & databases

- Local system resources

- Other AI applications

:::
::::


# MCP Architecture {.center}

<div style="text-align: center;">

![MCP Architecture](./images/mcp-simple-diagram.jpg){width=800 style="margin: 20px auto; display: block;"}

</div>

---

## How MCP Works {.smaller}

1. **Connection** - AI model connects via MCP server
2. **Tool Discovery** - MCP server exposes available tools/resources
3. **Request** - Model requests tool execution with parameters
4. **Execution** - Server executes tool and returns results
5. **Context Update** - Results become part of model context

---

## MCP Architecture {.smaller}

**Components:**

- **Client**: AI model/application

- **Server**: Provides tools and resources

- **Transport**: Communication protocol (stdio, HTTP, WebSocket)

- **Protocol**: Standard message format

---

## MCP Features {.smaller}

- **Transport Flexibility:** stdio, HTTP, WebSocket

- **Tool Registry:** Dynamic tool discovery

- **Resource Access:** Files, APIs, databases

- **Security:** Sandboxed execution, permission-based

---

## Why MCP Matters {.smaller}

- **Standardization:** One protocol for all AI integrations

- **Interoperability:** Switch between models tanpa mengubah integration code

- **Security:** Sandboxed tool execution

- **Scalability:** Server can manage multiple clients

## Key Takeaways {.smaller}

- **1. Standardization is Key** - MCP provides universal protocol untuk AI integrations

- **2. Flexibility & Interoperability** - Switch models tanpa mengubah integration code

- **3. Security by Design** - Sandboxed execution dengan permission-based access
